banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: A marriage of opposites: Krump meets Mozart
videoData.socialTitle: A marriage of opposites: Krump meets Mozart

nodes.whoTheyAre: Logan Wolf, known simply as WOLF, has been consistently and delightedly breaking the mold of his beloved dance for more than ten years. The founder WOLF of the dance group Prime Fam, he has won dance competitions all over the world, while he has worked with singers and songwriters such as Indila and Soprano. WOLF has been at the forefront of the movement to see krumping accepted as an art form all its very own.

videoData.description: Artist WOLF embodies the art of krumping from the subtlest movement to the largest, exaggerated jabs. He surprises and delights the TED@BCG audience with his juxtaposition of hard-hitting krump with the drama of classical music from the greats.
videoData.socialDescription: Artist WOLF embodies the art of krumping from the subtlest movement to the largest, exaggerated jabs. He surprises and delights the TED@BCG audience with his juxtaposition of hard-hitting krump with the drama of classical music from the greats.
